attributes.action: Nationalise DartCharge to remove the bridge from private company hands.
attributes.background: I feel that the Dartford Crossing should be held by the public, to stop money being generated for a private company, and to ensure the service is run in the interests of the public. Thousands of people have been affonted by this company and I believe it needs to stop.

rejection.details: Dart Charge is not a private company. It is the responsibility of Highways England, which is a public body.
